title: playground: make the embedded version more compact
body:
This blog post makes good use to the playground:

https://developer.washingtonpost.com/pb/blog/post/2016/04/06/embrace-go/

It'd be nice if there were no "The Go Playground" heading, or "About", "Format", or "Imports" button. Instead the Run button could float in the top right (or bottom right, over the output section).

cc @broady
